onboarding.share_your_moments_descr: Keep your special moments close right on your home screen.
onboarding.easy_to_use_descr: Share your code with someone you'd like to connect with then start sending notes to each other.
onboarding.lets_get_started_descr: Create your account and start sharing moments with someone special.
onboarding.welcome_to_nottu_descr: The easiest way to share how you feel or what you're experiencing.
onboarding.why_nottu_descr: You can express your mood or a moment to just one person through widget notes.

errors.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

text.notifications_permission_description: We need notification permission to keep you informed when new notes are sent or when important updates occur, such as pairing status.
text.contacts_permission_description: We need access to your contacts so you can easily invite friends or share your pairing code.
text.activate_notifications_descr: Enable notifications to be notified when someone shares a note with you or pairs with you.
text.connect_with_contacts_descr: Connect your contacts to quickly reach your friends and invite them.
text.register_complete_descr: This is your match code — share it with someone you'd like to start exchanging notes with.
text.register_complete_info: You can always access your match code within the app.
text.you_can_add_me: you can add me with this code.

auth.email_already_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth.weak_password: Password should be at least 6 characters.
auth.too_many_requests: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
auth.invalid_credential: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
